name: Hidden Object: Mystery of Mysteries of the Aztecs
summary: Everyone wants to take part in an interesting adventure in search of ancient civilizations. Do not miss your chance, not everyone has in life! You'll have to show attentiveness, speed of thinking to solve the difficult but very interesting problems. And only after that you can see the beauty of the ancient world, which has hidden waiting for many centuries! Do not waste your time and forward - to new adventures!
